name: Death Sentence
desc:
👋 Grab the soul to start a new adventure.
🦆 Tweet this to appear in credits.

name: Restless Dream
desc:
💤 Sleep to recover lost 🟢 Energy.
Might also keep 💭 Dreaming.

name: Bad Thought
desc:
🌀 Roll or 🔰 Block to avoid getting hit.
Enemies spend 🟢 Energy to attack.

name: Floating Shrimp
desc:
Food restores ❤️ Health and 🟢 Energy
🍴 Eat food to refresh resources.

name: Shaping Decision
desc:
Choose a perk to shape the character.
Some may come with a sacrifice.

name: Awakening Moment
desc:
👣 Walk to explore the surroundings.
It is finally time to move ahead.

name: Pile of Rubble
desc:
Rocks and wood laying on the ground.
Nothing of particular interest.

name: Confused Earthworm
desc:
The poor thing has a sunlight shock.
Perfect fishing bait.

name: Startled Crow
desc:
The crow appears to be going for the eyes.
Quickly cover before the impact.

name: Ruined House
desc:
Appears being neglected long time.
Strange noises is coming out.

name: Haunting Voice
desc:
Eerie whispers and screams echoing around.
Coming from all directions.

name: Cotton Ball
desc:
Must have been lost recently.
Still in a good condition.

name: Black Cat
desc:
These usually bring bad luck.
"Meow... meow..."

name: Angry Goose
desc: Peace was never an option.

name: Apple Tree
desc:
A fruit tree in a middle of the village.
Who would have thought.

name: Ripe Apple
desc: Looks all shiny and juicy.

name: Fruit Worm
desc:
Must have fallen off the apple.
Perfect fishing bait.

name: Alpha Ram
desc:
Getting ready for ramming.
Better dodge the horns.

name: Sparkling Fountain
desc:
Filed with pristine cold water.
There's a small cross at the top.

name: Possesive Swan
desc: Peace was never an option.

name: Unsettling House
desc:
There are blood drops leading outside.
But otherwise looks abandoned.

name: Rusty Knife
desc:
The blade still looks sharp a bit.
Perhaps it could be of service.
message: Took it with themselves just in case.

name: Dire Rat
desc:
Appeared out of nowhere.
Probably carries diseases.

name: Altar of Hatred
desc:
There's a blood on the surface.
Eerie atmosphere is in the air.

name: Fleshy Bone
desc:
Could be remains of one of the villagers.
No other clues around.

name: Stray Dog
desc:
The creature looks kind of aggressive.
But its eyes say otherwise.

name: Desolate Grave
desc:
The text reads "No rest for the wicked."
Ground seems tampered with.
message: A corpse has risen from the ground.

name: Animated Dead
desc:
Surely carries a lot of diseases.
Better to keep distance.

name: Meatfly Worm
desc:
Found buried inside the undead meat.
Unsettling fishing bait.

name: Engagement Ring
desc:
Shines bright on the dead hand.
There's a glowing gem on it.
message: Felt a surge in the chest

name: Grass Patch
desc:
No reason to bother stopping here.
Unless to catch a breath.
message: A wild animal was hidden there!

name: Poisonous Snake
desc:
Perfectly blends with the surroundings.
Almost stepped on it.

name: Clock Tower
desc:
The clock has stopped moving.
Looks long time abandoned.

name: Strange Hat
desc:
A radical piece of clothing.
Kinda tempting.

name: Worried Crow
desc:
Another crow appeared from somewhere.
Seems to be looking for its mate.

name: Pine Trees
desc:
A small group of trees.
Finally chance to rest.

name: Curious Owl
desc:
Stares back without blinking an eye.
Almost feels like about to speak.

name: Animal Trap
desc:
Something is likely captured inside.
Shaking around vigorously.

name: Rabid Raccoon
desc:
Kinda cute on the first glance.
Ferocious on the second.

name: Spoiled Cheese
desc:
Actually smells terrible.
Still tempting though.

name: Cheese Worm
desc:
Fell out of the spoiled cheese.
Likely a good fishing bait.

name: Practice Target
desc:
There is not a scratch on the target.
Seems totally unused.

name: Pile of Bones
desc:
There are bones scattered all around.
Doesn't look like an accident.

name: Radiating Bow
desc:
Looks all about ready for battle.
The pile of bones won't miss it.
message: Shot an arrow in the knee

name: Bronze Key
desc:
Looks well worn but still usable.
Perhaps unlocks a secret.

name: Frantic Deer
desc:
Its majestic antlers look rather deadly.
Better not underestimate it.

name: Tall Reeds
desc:
Sunlight reflects through it.
Suggesting a hidden pond.

name: Obscured Pond
desc:
Waves are dancing on the water surface.
Something sparkles at the bottom.

name: Starved Goat
desc:
Would eat anything at this point.
Emaciated to the bone.

name: Barricaded Church
desc:
Strange sounds are coming from the inside.
Eerie atmosphere is in the air.

name: Church Entrance
desc:
A huge chain holds the door closed.
As if something was locked inside.

name: Undead Grizzly
desc:
There's an axe sticked into its head.
Still packs a punch.

name: Bloody Axe
desc:
Battle-proven makeshift weapon.
Definitely could be of service.

name: Eternal Flame
desc:
Calming aura radiates around.
Chance for a breather.

name: Tulip Glade
desc:
Colorful tulips literally everywhere.
Something seems hidden among them.

name: Rainbow Unicorn
desc:
Strange horse approached.
Intentions are unclear.

name: Dark Grove
desc:
Nothing but endless trees in all directions.
A quiet place to rest.

name: Resentful Peacock
desc: Peace was never an option.
message: Eyes melted by the feather reflections.

name: Pile of Timber
desc:
Wooden logs laying on the ground.
Nothing of particular interest.

name: Disturbed Earthworm
desc:
Seems angry of the disturbance.
Handy fishing bait.

name: Tall Weeds
desc:
No reason to bother stopping here.
Unless to catch a breath.

name: Stubborn Drake
desc: Uhh. Peace was an option?

name: Tiny Pond
desc:
Waves are dancing on the surface.
Something sparkles at the bottom.

name: Rose Bush
desc:
These are just beautiful.
Perhaps grab some.

name: Campsite
desc:
There is a tent and a campfire.
No one seems to be around.

name: Book Pile
desc:
Laying among a bunch of other junk.
The bottom book slightly glows.

name: Book of Spells
desc:
Radiates with magic energy.
Holds immense power.

name: Resolute Druid
desc:
Noticed suspicious activity in their camp.
"Never should have come here!"

name: Suspicious Mushroom
desc:
Exemplar of an unrecognisable species.
Consumable at least once.

name: Psychotic Episode
desc:
Cannot tell left from right.
Also not up from down.

name: Forest Skunk
desc:
Seems having lightning reflexes.
Fight or flight.

name: Picnic Basket
desc:
Someone must have lost it here.
Maybe there is still something inside

name: Wheat Cookie
desc:
Smells absolutely amazing.
Likely packs a burst of energy.

name: Simple Hut
desc:
A simple tent and a campfire.
No one seems to be around.

name: Pile of Skulls
desc:
Adventures seem to usually end here.
Better stay alert.

name: Old Troll
desc:
Noticed suspicious activity in their hut.
"Human no walk here!"

name: Golden Trinket
desc:
Forcefully draws the eyesight.
Almost irresistible.

name: Sweet Honeypot
desc:
Seems like a fine refreshment.
The lid is trembling though.
message: The honeypot was full of bees.

name: Swarm of Bees
desc:
The bees instantly swarmed the area.
There's nowhere to run

name: Bee Larva
desc:
Seems angry of the disturbance.
Handy fishing bait.

name: Honey Badger
desc:
The creature boasts sinister energy.
Better to not underestimate.

name: Alpha Boar
desc:
Loud stomps follow its steps.
Must weight a ton.

name: Boar Meat
desc:
Still all warm and bloody.
Sadly there's no fire around.
message: Got sick of the raw meat.

name: Overgrown Reeds
desc:
This seems like the only way forward.
But anything could be hiding there.

name: Swamp of Sorrows
desc:
Murky water bubbles every now and then.
Stay alert.

name: Frog-faced Giant
desc:
Foul stench reeks from it's mouth.
Bloodshot eyes blink slowly.

name: King's Crown
desc:
This is where it ends for now.
Tweet this to appear in credits!
